Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class ActionPhaseTest

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ActionPhaseTest
public class ActionPhaseTest extends Object
Tests for ActionPhase's methods. Since the class is abstract, a mock will be used.

      @Test void testGetFromEntrance() throws InvalidPhaseUpdateException

      InvalidPhaseUpdateException

      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException

      Tests if the phase updates students in the hall and professors after ActionPhase.addToHall(Player, Student)
      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException

    • testUpdateHallCoins

      @Test void testUpdateHallCoins() throws InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      Check that on 3,6,9 students a coin is given to a player.

      Note: a coin is not given if the size was already 3,6,9.

      Throws:
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException

    • testAddToIsland
